title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Get started with ethical hacking, threat detection, and network security.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms in C++
description: Master DSA concepts using C++ with tons of practice problems.

title: Python for Data Analysis
description: Analyze and visualize data using Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

title: Cloud Computing Basics
description: Understand cloud models, deployment, and intro to AWS, Azure, GCP.

title: Full-Stack Development with MERN
description: Build full-stack apps using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.

title: Linux for Beginners
description: Learn the Linux command line and system basics for devs and hackers.

title: Kubernetes Crash Course
description: Deploy, manage, and scale containerized apps using Kubernetes.

title: Networking Fundamentals
description: Dive into networking concepts: IP, TCP/UDP, DNS, and routing.

title: Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn
description: Intro to ML concepts with hands-on projects using Scikit-Learn.

title: Ethical Hacking: Tools and Techniques
description: Learn common hacking tools and how to ethically exploit vulnerabilities.
